snippet.title: Pokémon Puffy Pink ROM Hack Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the game patch here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1uJPFnEnRMw3-g6NLi-haz2k_sYOXyxWa?usp=drive_link

Welcome to Pokémon Puffy Pink! After months of hard work, I am happy to present this Pokémon Fire Red ROM hack with all 151 Pokémon replaced by Kirby characters. From classic enemies like Waddle Dee and Whispy Woods, to the more obscure like Tornadon and Brobo, every single one has a full unique moveset, stat spread, abilities, typing, Pokédex entry, and everything else!

Massive shoutout and thank you to the developers of Hex Maniac Advance. Without it, I would've never been able to make this.
